column1: Saki West is a Local Government Area in Oyo State
column2: Nigeria. Its headquarters are in the town of Saki. Shaki
column3: Nigeria is located at the extreme end of Oyo state. It has a ressetlement center of 2nd Mechanised division of Nigerian Army
column5: Technical College and a School of Command.

column2: Nigeria is also one of the largest city in Oyo state.

column1: The postal code of the area is 203.
